_WAF(config_before, config_after, device)[source]¶

HOST and NAND write bytes are captured before and after test to determine total logical & physical write bytes. NAND total write will then divide to NAND total write to calcuate Flash Wrirte Amplification.

havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.storage.nvme.nvme module¶

class havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.storage.nvme.nvme.NVME(device, external_file=None)[source]¶

Bases: havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.storage.smart_validation_abstract.SmartValidationAbstract

The class takes external json file as input(default to cfg/nvme_validate.json). The json file is structure to have nvme specific commands and fields under nvme key and any vendor specific commands and fields under vendor name Key. The class returns nvme and vendor specific data using get_logs function. Any nvme specific command and output parsing should be part of this class and vendor specific command parsing should go in respective vendor class. Vendor specific command output is obtained dynamically using command name specified in external json inside .

__init__(device, external_file=None)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

_get_config_dir(ext_file)[source]¶
NVME json files are placed in two directories in
havoc/autotest_testfiles/validation_utils

  • cfg/nvme_smart

  • cfg/nvme_smart_fdi

JSON files specific for Flash Data Integirty tests are placed in

nvme_smart_fdi. Other files go in nvme_smart.

@param string ext_file: NVME json file name @return string: directory with config file

get_write_amplification(smart_before, smart_after)[source]¶

Function to get the Flash Write Amplification HOST and NAND write bytes are captured before and after test to determine total logical & physical write bytes. @param smart_before: Smart data before the test @param smart_after: Smart data before the test
